name: StarGayzer
description:
PLEASE NOTE: StarGayzer is not currently working at full capacity. Most of the story progression features are currently broken, and new posts will not appear in the world.

Submission for Rainbow Game Jam 2022 with theme "Here to Stay"

StarGayzer is an interactive visual novel where you explore people's social media posts in space through your StarGazerTM Telescope!

Controls:

  • Mouse click on everything!
  • Mouse click and drag to pan
  • Keyboard arrows also pan
  • Keyboard to type in posts

Hints:

  • The yellow circles on the edge of the view point to where unread posts are!
  • Click a username or user icon to see their profile, then follow them!
  • Most replies will let you select an emoji, but some replies are text. Reply everywhere to find them!
  • More posts show up as you like, reply, and follow

Credits:

  • Music in the background from https://www.FesliyanStudios.com
  • Dogica Font from https://www.dafont.com/roberto-mocci.d8882

Thanks for playing! Let us know what you think and if you have anything you particularly liked or would change
